data.title: Justin Timberlake Net Worth: How much money does the singer who has been arrested for drink-driving have?
data.meta_description:
Justin Timberlake, a multifaceted talent known for his singing, acting, and business ventures, boasts a net worth of $250 million. 

His journey in the entertainment industry began
data.text:
Justin Timberlake, a multifaceted talent known for his singing, acting, and business ventures, boasts a net worth of $250 million.

His journey in the entertainment industry began as a child, leading to fame with the boy band NSYNC and later flourishing into a successful solo career.

Timberlake has diversified his portfolio with business ventures like 901 tequila, the William Rast clothing line, co-owned restaurants, and even an investment in Myspace.com.

On the other hand, Jessica Biel, an accomplished actress, model, and producer, shares a combined net worth of $250 million with her husband. However, an estimated between $200 - $230 million, comes from Justin's earnings.

In the world of showbiz, Justin Timberlake has left an indelible mark not only through music but also in acting.

From starring in films like "The Social Network" to voicing characters in the "Trolls" franchise, his versatility shines.

Timberlake's entrepreneurial spirit extends to endorsements, record labels, and film and television production.

Notably, he recently sold his song catalog for an estimated $100 million.

The couple's combined net worth not only reflects their professional accomplishments but also underscores their strategic investments and business acumen.

Justin Timberlake & Jessica Biel, a celebrity power couple

The couple, who tied the knot in 2012 and shares two sons, Silas and a younger sibling, Phineas, born in July 2020, own a real estate portfolio as impressive as their professional achievements.

In 2010, they purchased a penthouse in NYC's Soho neighborhood for $6.6 million, later selling it in 2019.

They also own a luxurious duplex penthouse in Tribecca, listed for $29 million in January 2022.

Beyond the bustling city life, Justin and Jessica own a sprawling estate in the Hollywood Hills, acquired in 2002, and a 130-acre undeveloped property near Nashville, purchased in 2015 for $4 million.
